critique: This executive order delegates presidential authority regarding oil and hazardous substance discharge to various agencies, including the EPA, Coast Guard, and Federal Maritime Commission. It aims to implement the Federal Water Pollution Control Act. There's a slight liberal tilt due to environmental protection focus. Immigration is not relevant. Executive power is slightly reduced as authority is delegated. Federalism is neutral. National security vs. civil liberties is balanced. Economic regulation leans towards intervention due to environmental regulations. Social inclusion is neutral.
